skills.skill: Public Cloud Providers (Google, AWS, Microsoft Azure, OCI)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive adoption, best practices, and value for largest cloud customers
Shape and drive technical architecture, solutioning, and configuration for cloud customers
Provide consultative guidance to strategic cloud customers for successful adoption and expansion
Understand customer roadmap and provide support for customer's cloud strategy
Act as the primary technical liaison between Customer Success and Engineering, representing the voice of the customer

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in engineering, computer science, MIS, finance or equivalent (Master's preferred)
FinOps Practitioner certified with 3+ years of practical experience
